channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Custom Widget area
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Custom Widget area

item.title: CVE-2023-6066|2024-01-15T15:10:43.076Z -- unknown -- wp%20custom%20widget%20area
item.description: The WP Custom Widget area WordPress plugin through 1.2.5 does not properly apply capability and nonce checks on any of its AJAX action callback functions, which could allow attackers with subscriber+ privilege to create, delete or modify menus on the site.
